questions.question: Why are pronouns so useful when we write? What effect do they have on a text?

choices.answer: Replace nouns, less repetition
Replace proper names
Make the text look prettier
Make emphasis

questions.question: What are the first person pronouns?

choices.answer: I, we/us
you
he/him,   she/her,     it
They/them

choices.answer: I, we/us
you
he/him,   she/her,     it

questions.question: Replace the first person pronoun: If climate changes continues, our planet will be in trouble. (the)

choices.answer: If climate changes continues, our planet will be in trouble.
If climate changes continues, the planet will be in trouble.
If the climate changes continues, our planet will be in trouble.
If climate changes continues, our the planet will be in trouble.
Our report reveals  this important evidence.
Our report reveals important this evidence.
This report reveals important evidence.

If everyone rode bikes, there would be less air pollution.
